casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. JOSEPH B. MARION (14007)

Heiman, Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Argued December 4, 1995 decision released January 9, 1996 *907Joseph B. Marion, pro se, the appellant (defendant). Jack W. Fischer, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were MarkS. Solak, state’s attorney, Paul Narducci and Vincent Dooley, assistant state’s attorneys, saadDavidJ. Sheldon, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
